biocontainers.name: mrs
biocontainers.summary: Information retrieval system for biomedical databanks

biotools.summary: MRS is a biological data retrieval system that can be accessed over the web, or installed and used locally.  MRS indexes several flat-file data sets for searching, including  EMBL nucleotide, UniProt, PDB and KEGG.  Searches can be performed globally, or on one or more flat file fields per data set.
